title: Fake I.D.
description: Some kids use fake ID. But to find your Gran used it for years is a shock. YA novel with a family history mystery twist.Turns out Gran was not just Magda, she had other names and lives.On the day of Gran's funeral Zoe found the package. The label said 'Not to be opened until after my death.' So Zoe opened it.Was Gran a political activist? A con artist? Or worse?Can you inherit 'bad' genes or just a big nose and red hair? Zoe finds out with the help of her hi-tech, hockey-playing mate Luke, via the finalthoughts.com, and the Dead Persons Society online.Alchemy has details and links to where Hazel's e-books available. http://ebookalchemy.com.au/ByImprint....Also a Tamil edition by Cre-A publishers in Chennai.
author: Hazel Edwards
